snippet.title: MIND: Path to Thalamus Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
BUY "MIND" ON STEAM NOW: http://store.steampowered.com/app/296070

MIND: A Path to Thalamus is a First Person Puzzler that throws you into a fantastic, surreal environment. You will bend the natural elements to your will in order to progress in this emotive, mindbending tale. 

Developed by 

Carlos Coronado: https://twitter.com/krateos29
Luka Nieto: https://twitter.com/LukaNieto
Dani navarro: https://twitter.com/playerdng

Music by Chris Zabriskie: http://chriszabriskie.com

Voice by Greg Nugent: www.gregnugentva.com

Additional coding by Jose Ladislao: https://twitter.com/L4D15

Twitter: https://twitter.com/MindVideogame

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mindvideogame
